content: नितंबिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नितंब-अस्त्यर्थे इनि] {@--1@} Having beautiful hips, having wellsloped buttocks (often applied to जघन); <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>M. 2. 3</ls>; <ls>Ki. 8. 16</ls> <ls>R. 19. 26.</ls> {@--2@} Having beautiful sides (as a mountain). --नी {@--1@} A woman with large and handsome hips; <ls>Ki. 8. 3</ls>; <ls>Śi. 7. 68</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 7.</ls> {@--2@} A woman in general; <ls>Pt. 4. 32</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 4.">86.</ls>
